name: Triangulator
description:
Triangulator is a 2D Top-Down shooting game made in Unity.

You play as a Triangle, which has to fight of other geometrical forms with various weapons like:

  • An RPG
  • An MP
  • And a pistol

 The goal of the game is to get a high score on the map you're currently playing on and to beat your old one.

My goal is to raise at least 25$ with the release so I can release it on Android after that I would need about 200$ for an IOS release so that even more people can play Triangulator.
